dmca.title: eCompanyStore.com:  Just Asking
dmca.body:
[Private],

 

I'm intrigued by your websites (http://www.e-companystores.com/home.asp and http://www.goconceptsinc.com/ecompanystores/home.asp) and I'd like to ask you three questions. 

 

How long have you been in business? 
How long have you been using the name e-Company Stores 
The contact information of your attorney? 
 

We are obviously more than a little dismayed at your use of a trademark that so closely resembles ours and are seeking legal advice on the issue. In order to properly alert you of any perceived improprieties we would like the name of your legal counsel, who we would copy on any correspondence relative to this issue.

 

 

[Private]
CEO
eCompanyStore
www.ecompanystore.com
[Private]
[Private]
[Private]30005

[Private]
[Private]
[Private]
